dict.string: if [[ ! -f "$TM_NEW_FILE" ]]; then TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` \ TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` \ a=`echo ${TM_NEW_FILE#$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY/src/}` \ b=`echo ${a%/$TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME.as}` \ c=`echo ${b#/}` \ TM_CLASS_PATH=`echo $c | tr '/' '.'` \ perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' \ < class.as > "$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
